Domiati cheese, nke a na-akpọkwazi cheese ọcha (Egyptian Arabic: جبنة بيضا gebna bēḍa Egyptian Arabic pronunciation: ), bụ cheese na-acha ọcha nke a na emekari n’ obodo Egypt, kamakwa na Sudan ya na mba ndị ọzọ dị n'Etiti Ebe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Ụwa.  A na-ejikarị mmiri ara ehi, mmiri oke ara ehi maọbụ ngwakọta eme ya, a pụkwara iji mmiri ara ehi ndị ọzọ, dịka atụrụ, ewu maọbụ mmiri ara kamel were mee ya
Ọ bụ cheese ndị Ijipt a na-ahụkarị
N'adịghị ka feta na cheese ndị ọzọ na-acha ọcha, a na-agbakwunye nnu ozugbo na mmiri ara ehi, tupu agbakwunye rennet
A na-akpọ ya aha obodo ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri nke Obodo Damietta (دمياط).
